name: Where are my pipes?
summary:
It's beavers' versus the water supply - to reverse the chaos caused by the furry troublemakers, you'll have to work hard... Especially since all the pipes are ruined!
The houses and their occupants are left without water in 45 locations, that's a lot of lengths of pipe and cunning engineering solutions. If that wasn't enough you still have one mischievious beaver working against you!
